metadata.title: CVE-2016-2221 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Open redirect vulnerability in the wp_validate_redirect function inwp-includes/pluggable.php in WordPress before 4.4.2 allows remote attackersto redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via amalformed URL that triggers incorrect hostname parsing, as demonstrated byan https:example.com URL.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
